about_the_game:
AI Solitaire features both Klondike Solitaire and Pyramid Solitaire. It includes 18 different deck styles to choose from and has password protected parental controls to make sure that you and your family only see the content you choose to see. The base game is offered for free and can be played as is without any cost forever. We plan to offer rulesets DLC with additional solitaire versions and content DLC with more fun deck styles that you can choose to purchase, or not.

The 18 deck styles in the base game include 3 traditional playing card decks and 15 AI art-based card decks. 3 card decks are rated "Family Friendly". 15 card decks are rated "Teen+". There are no "Adult" rated card decks included in the base game. None of the decks in the base game include any nudity.

TRADITIONAL DECKS
  • Traditional Face Cards
  • Easy Read Alphanumeric Cards
  • Warm Fuzzies

TEEN+ DECKS
  • Animated Face Cards
  • Anime Girls
  • Bikini Beach 3D
  • Bikini Elf
  • Future So Bright
  • Hostess Hotties
  • In The Pool
  • Neon Cyberbabes
  • Pop Stars
  • Spoiled
  • Steampunk Beauties
  • Super Girls
  • Swimsuit Illustrated
  • Treasure Hunters
  • Zombie Zoo

content_descriptors.notes:
The first time you run AI Solitaire you will be directed to the Parental Controls menu. There you can set the allowable content level that will be seen in the game. You may protect these settings with a password, or you can permanently change them so that they can only be changed by uninstalling and reinstalling the game.

AI Solitaire is intended to be a celebration of AI Generated Art. The content often includes beautiful women or handsome men. The outfits and costumes can be revealing. Various art styles may feature exagerated proportions. Swimsuits and sexy clothing will always have a minimum of a Teen+ rating. Overly exagerated female proportions or wearing lingerie will be rated Adult. The base game doesn't contain any nudity or Adult rated decks. The "Steampunk Beauties" deck is about as racy as a Teen+ rated deck would get.

The base game contains mainly content for people who enjoy looking at women, although there are several Family Friendly card decks included, as well.

legal_notice:
AI Solitaire is © Copyright 2024 by Denki Gaka. All Rights Reserved.
Please Note: The art for the majority of the card decks was created using Stable Diffusion, an artificial intelligence text to image generator. The main purpose in creating this product was to test the limits of what is possible using this amazing new technology. We claim copyright in the card deck images as they are presented here, but acknowledge that the artwork is not an original work made by us, but rather is the results of years of hard work by talented computer scientists, as well as decades, if not centuries, of artistic endeavor by the truly talented artists whose work was used to train the models. Acknowledgement and our thanks goes out to both groups.

Some of our decks may feature likenesses of celebrities and historical figures. None of these individuals were involved in the production of this work and we claim no endorsement from them. These images are included as parody and tribute to their genuine awesomeness. We label these decks as "Celebritease", with the emphasis on "TEASE". There are certainly similarities to the famous individuals, but we doubt that any of them would see these images and mistake them for their own reflection in a mirror.
name: AI Solitaire

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 240 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible
  • VR Support: No VR Support
  • Additional Notes: Internet connectivity is not required, and is only used to notify you of product updates.

short_description: AI Solitaire features Klondike Solitaire and Pyramid Solitaire, 18 different deck styles, and has password protected parental controls. The base game is offered for free and can be played as is without any cost forever.
